page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT IN PENDLESIDE
page.content: In our area the{two main places of {employment}are:{60 Plus Mail Order Textiles(originally formed to provide work for the retired) and employing mainly local people,{andSpenbrook Mill (ll5 years old) and originally a cotton mill, but{now carpets are made {there.}Forty local people are employed in operating l3 machines. The carpets are made from wool and man made fibres by a process called tufting and are backed with foam rubber. There are some{small businesses,employ ing{a few people,}mainly joinery,build ing etc. {Farming}is the{main occupation,}but these are mainly self-employed or family concerns.
